en_question:
A factory produces three types of products. The weight and profit of each product are shown in Table 7-8. These products are to be shipped to the market for sale, and the total transportation capacity cannot exceed 10 tons. Table 7-8
Product TypeWeight (t/piece)Profit (yuan/piece)
12100
23140
34180
cn_question:
7.19某工厂生产三种产品，各种产品重量与利润关系如表7-8所示。现将此三种产品运往市场出售，运输能力总重量不超过 $10\,\mathfrak{t}$ 。问如何安排运输使总利润最大？ 表7-8
种类重量/(t/件）利润 /(元/件)
